trans-unit.target: The Maar have stepped up their defenses. Try researching Marines to level 2!
X-1 Cannons are made to take the hits and dish out splash damage. Destroy this turret first!
Don’t forget to keep researching troops levels for increased attack and health!
Specters are great for sniping buildings while other troops take damage.
Turrets are XP jackpots! Lucky for you, the Maar have lined them up for you to take them down.
Deploy some Rhinos first to take the damage off the Marines!
Troops can be dropped in groups or individually. Save some to deploy after the way is clear!
Erazi Level 100
Maar’s defense strategy has changed. This might be a good time to test a Shrike attack!
To clear out large bases quickly, use Shrikes!
The Maar have cultivated neural fungi networks, which accelerates their response times. Be cautious!
The war between the Erazi Syndicate and the Maar has distracted both factions. Raid Mallick's compound for crystals!
We're running low on supplies, and the Maar have built a new base close to our border. Coincidence?
Mallick's goal is to wipe out all non-Maar life in the galaxy. We need to destroy his forces wherever we find them.
Commander, if you destroy this last Syndicate outpost, you'll have crippled their forces in this sector. Good luck!
While Executrix Scyllith bombards the Maar Confederacy in the Xurux Sector, we can hit this Maar command center!
Commander, if we hit this Confederacy base, we can replenish our supply of crystals. It's worth the risk.
The Maar have stolen schematics for Incendiary Turrets from the Erazi. This outpost will be heavily defended.
Mallick will never forgive you for besieging his outposts, so there's nothing to lose by attacking another one.
The Confederacy's cease-fire with the Helio Legion won't last. Take advantage of the situation and hit them now.
Maar Level 10
Maar Level 15
Maar Level 20
Maar Level 25
Maar Level 30
Maar Level 40
Maar Level 50
Maar Level 65
Maar Level 80
Strike from the weakest point. Don’t forget to check the turret ranges!
Tesla towers can fire on more than one target. Place your attack to avoid its lightning bolts!
Maar Level 100
Scan
Be sure to destroy the Command Center to ensure victory!
Commander, it is recommended you train up some Rhinos for this mission to take the heavy fire!
Throw everything at them!
Need resources, but cannot collect enough during your attack? Try attacking again right away!
Holes in defenses are not always holes. Look for where a type of troop might be especially useful!
Helio Level 100
Erazi Level 3
Erazi Level 6
This is General Grod. Don't be fooled by his talk of honor. He's a dangerous opponent. We need to take him down.
While the Erazi bombard Helio Legion territory from orbit, we should strike at this outpost!
The Legion are planning an assault on our base. A pre-emptive strike is the best defense we have.
Time to test General Grod's defenses. Sweep this Helio Legion outpost and seize as much uranium as possible.
Given all of Grod's bluster about the rules of war, he might just congratulate you for destroying this outpost.
The Legion's forces are currently besieging Maar bases. This base's defenses are particularly thin...
Grod says he wants a truce, but it's just a ploy. Hit this outpost and demolish his command center.
Until we find a new source of uranium, we should keep hitting Legion outposts. Just watch those turrets!
Using Cerulean technology, the Helio Legion have reverse-engineered Incendiary Turrets. Be careful with this one.
General Grod has saluted your skill on the battlefield. You should acknowledge the compliment by attacking.
The Legion and the Maar Confederacy have declared a truce. While Grod's guard is down, you should strike.
Concussion turrets can really slow down your attack. Keep an eye out for them!
Uranium is the resource needed for training troops. Be sure to collect as much as you can!
Resources are often heavily guarded. Use caution when placing your attack!
Try different mixes of troops, drop zones, and wave timing to find the winning combo!
Some turrets are powerful but have short ranges. Focus long range units on these towers.
Governor Mallick wants to use Cerulean technology to eradicate humanity. Time for a pre-emptive attack on his base.
Mallick's scientists in the Maar Confederacy have begun work on tachyon cannons. Strike before they're deployed.
That’s a lot of Tesla towers. Good thing Specters can shoot them from afar!
This is it, Commander. If we can smash through their defenses, we can neutralize the Maar threat in this region.
Supply Depots contain resources on other player bases. Try attacking a fellow player!
Shrikes are powerful on the battlefield. Their speed and rapid fire tears through defenses!
Try different attack tactics in combination for a more powerful strike!
This is Executrix Scyllith, leader of the Erazi. She's built a new outpost in this sector. We need to destroy it!
The Erazi Syndicate's flank is exposed. This is the time to strike their westernmost base of operations.
Turrets will draw your troops away from the Command Center. Attack in waves for the win!
Be ready. This is Grod's last stand, and he's going to go down fighting. But if we win, this region is ours.
Helio Level 3
Helio Level 6
We need more energy. A strike on one of the more remote Erazi outposts would add to our reserves.
We should take advantage of the war between the Syndicate and the Confederacy. Scyllith's bases are weakened.
Maar Level 3
Maar Level 6
Mallick, Governor of the Maar, has sent a peace offering in the form of a map to a secret Syndicate base.
General Grod, leader of the Helio Legion, wants a cease-fire. But first, we have to strike the Erazi.
Executrix Scyllith just withdrew a few dozen troops from one of her remote outposts. Open fire while they're weak!
Upgrading your Warp Gate allows for more troops on the field. Remember, safety in numbers!
Helio Level 10
Troops will attack the nearest turret firing at them. Avoid triggering too many turrets at once.
Helio Level 15
Be warned, Commander. The Erazi have installed an Incendiary Turret at this Command Center. That'll cost us.
You can always click “End Battle” to withdraw any remaining troops on the field.
Helio Level 20
Like attacking a certain base? Play it again for experience and resources!
Helio Level 25
Scyllith's on the far side of the planet, negotiating with the Helio Legion. Take advantage of her absence.
Looks like the Ezari have invested in an Incendiary turret. It’s so hot, it burns!
Helio Level 30
Mallick's map was useful, but now he's attacking Scyllith's bases to create a distraction so we can attack.
When you’re in it to win it, take down the Command Center first.
Helio Level 40
Researching higher levels for troops is super effective! Keep that research queue going.
Helio Level 50
We intercepted an Erazi communiqué about Cerulean technology. You need to destroy their base immediately.
The training wheels are off. Unlock as many troop types as possible for the best offense!
Helio Level 65
Try clearing out turrets with long ranges first, and save room for a Specter for the perfect finish!
Helio Level 80
Turrets in circle formations are brutal. Use of rapid-fire and long range troops will be essential!
Missions Complete
Erazi Level 10
Erazi Level 15
Erazi Level 20
Erazi Level 25
Erazi Level 30
Erazi Level 40
Erazi Level 50
Erazi Level 65
Erazi Level 80
